description: Ruleset for material is 'specimen from organism'.
title: FAANG sample metadata rules for 'specimen from organism'
name: faang_samples_specimen.metadata_legacy_rules

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

specimen_collection_date.name: specimen collection date
specimen_collection_date.description: Date at which the specimen was collected.

animal_age_at_collection.name: animal age at collection
animal_age_at_collection.description: Animal age at the point of collection. An estimate is acceptable where the age is not precisely known.

developmental_stage.name: developmental stage
developmental_stage.description: Ontology for Developmental stage, UBERON is preferred to EFO.

health_status_at_collection.name: health status at collection
health_status_at_collection.description: Animal disease / health status at point of collection. Healthy animals should have the term normal, otherwise use the as many disease terms as necessary from EFO.

organism_part.name: organism part
organism_part.description: Ontology for part of organism specimen from, UBERON is preferred to BTO.

specimen_collection_protocol.name: specimen collection protocol
specimen_collection_protocol.description: A link to the protocol for specimen collection.

fasted_status.name: fasted status
fasted_status.description: Fed, fasted or unknown. Criteria for this status must be in your protocol.

specimen_volume.name: specimen volume
specimen_volume.description: Specimen volume. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

specimen_size.name: specimen size
specimen_size.description: Specimen size. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

specimen_weight.name: specimen weight
specimen_weight.description: Specimen weight. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

specimen_picture_url.name: specimen picture url
specimen_picture_url.description: A link a picture of the specimen, multiple links allowed.

gestational_age_at_sample_collection.name: gestational age at sample collection
gestational_age_at_sample_collection.description: If the animal was pregnant when the specimen was taken, state how long had been pregnant for.

derived_from.name: Derived from
derived_from.description: Sample name or BioSample ID for an animal record.
